headline: WHAT I DO...
dain:
I'm a web developer, visual designer, and artist that lives somewhere in between JPL, Art Center, the Norton Simon and Cal Tech. I've been working in the interactive design field since the late 90's and have also maintained a parallel art practice. I provide serivices for web development, creative consulting, and graphic design and work with a variety of people and businesses including artists, production agencies, commercial photographers, restaurants, and skateboarding brands. I've exhibited art both nationally and internationally.

Enjoy the work, and if you are interested in seeing additional work samples and a full CV Email Me.
